index.title: Lukium Swarm - ChatGPT API
index.action_instruction: Please enter your prompt below as well as your Lukium Swarm - ChatGPT API Key
index.message_after_submit_1: Please be patient while your request is processed...
index.message_after_submit_2: The time required to process is proportional to the length of the reply.

recall.title: Lukium Swarm - ChatGPT API
recall.action_instruction: Please enter your API Key and Conversation ID below

access_token.title: Lukium Swarm - ChatGPT API
access_token.action_instruction: Please enter your ChatGPT Email and Password below to retrieve your access token
access_token.message: This will retrieve your current ChatGPT OpenAI Access Token using your ChatGPT Email and Password.

add_user.title: Lukium Swarm - ChatGPT API
add_user.action_instruction: Please enter information below to add a new API key for a user

descriptions.api_key: OVERRIDEN IF PASSED VIA URL [user=] . Lukium Swarm API Key, NOT OpeanAI API Key
descriptions.email: Your OpenAI ChatGPT Email. This is the email that you use to login to the OpenAI ChatGPT website.
descriptions.password: Your OpenAI ChatGPT Password. This is the password that you use to login to the OpenAI ChatGPT website.

descriptions.plus: Should the user have access to the Plus API?
descriptions.is_client: A Client is a user that can create and manage their own API keys and store conversations within their own key in conversations.json. This is useful for developers who want to create their own applications that use the API.
descriptions.userid: The user's ID. This is the ID that will be used to identify the user in the API. This can be any string, but it is recommended to use a unique ID such as a Discord ID or a UUID.
descriptions.username: The user's username. This is the name that will be displayed in the API. This can be any string, but it is recommended to use the user's Discord username or some other name attached to another platform.

descriptions.api_key: OVERRIDEN IF PASSED VIA URL [user=] . Lukium Swarm API Key, NOT OpeanAI API Key
descriptions.conversation_id: OPTIONAL - Used to continue a conversation. If not provided, a new conversation will be started.
descriptions.plus: Use Plus or Free (Plus only available for Premium+ Supporters)
descriptions.reply_only: Get only the reply, not the full JSON response'
descriptions.pretty: Ignored if "Reply Only" = "No" | Use markdown styling (prettier) for the response?'
descriptions.access_token: OPTIONAL - OVERRIDEN IF PASSED VIA URL [access_token=] . OpenAI Access Token, NOT Lukium Swarm API Key. Can be retrieved using /access-token endpoint
descriptions.user_plus: Does this access token have OpenAI Plus?

descriptions.api_key: OVERRIDEN IF PASSED VIA URL [user=] . Lukium Swarm API Key, NOT OpeanAI API Key
descriptions.conversation_id: If NOT passed, will retrieve a list of all conversations' IDs and their titles. If PASSED, will retrieve the conversation's title and all messages' IDs, prompts and replies.
